order.description: Order for sorting. Almost by date of release, except similar versions are grouped together.

generation.description: The generation this version was introduced in.

move_learn_methods.description: A list of methods in which Pokémon can learn moves in this version group.

pokedexes.description: A list of Pokédexes introduces in this version group.

regions.description: A list of regions that can be visited in this version group.

versions.description: The versions this version group owns.
